card.name: Alabaster Dragon
card.text: Flying When Alabaster Dragon dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Alluring Scent
card.text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

card.name: Ancestral Memories
card.text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Archangel
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Armageddon
card.text: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Assassin's Blade
card.text: Cast Assassin's Blade only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Destroy target nonblack attacking creature.

card.name: Balance of Power
card.text: If target opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

card.name: Baleful Stare
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Mountain and red card in it.

card.name: Bee Sting
card.text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Blaze
card.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Blaze
card.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Blessed Reversal
card.text: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.

card.name: Blinding Light
card.text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.

card.name: Boiling Seas
card.text: Destroy all Islands.

card.name: Breath of Life
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Burning Cloak
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Burning Cloak deals 2 damage to that creature.

card.name: Capricious Sorcerer
card.text: {T}: Capricious Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Charging Bandits
card.text: Whenever Charging Bandits attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Charging Paladin
card.text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Charging Rhino
card.text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Cloak of Feathers
card.text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Cloud Dragon
card.text: Flying Cloud Dragon can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Cloud Pirates
card.text: Flying Cloud Pirates can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Cloud Spirit
card.text: Flying Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Command of Unsummoning
card.text: Cast Command of Unsummoning only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Return one or two target attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

card.name: Craven Giant
card.text: Craven Giant can't block.

card.name: Craven Knight
card.text: Craven Knight can't block.

card.name: Cruel Bargain
card.text: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Cruel Fate
card.text: Look at the top five cards of target opponent's library. Put one of those cards into that player's graveyard and the rest on top of his or her library in any order.

card.name: Cruel Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Deep Wood
card.text: Cast Deep Wood only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

card.name: Deep-Sea Serpent
card.text: Deep-Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

card.name: Defiant Stand
card.text: Cast Defiant Stand only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Target creature gets +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

card.name: Deja Vu
card.text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Devastation
card.text: Destroy all creatures and lands.

card.name: Dread Charge
card.text: Black creatures you control can't be blocked this turn except by black creatures.

card.name: Dread Reaper
card.text: Flying When Dread Reaper enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

card.name: Dry Spell
card.text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Earthquake
card.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

card.name: Ebon Dragon
card.text: Flying When Ebon Dragon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

card.name: Elven Cache
card.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Endless Cockroaches
card.text: When Endless Cockroaches dies, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Exhaustion
card.text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

card.name: False Peace
card.text: Target player skips all combat phases of his or her next turn.

card.name: Final Strike
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Final Strike, sacrifice a creature. Final Strike deals damage to target opponent equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Fire Dragon
card.text: Flying When Fire Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Fire Imp
card.text: When Fire Imp enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Fire Snake
card.text: When Fire Snake dies, destroy target land.

card.name: Fire Tempest
card.text: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Flashfires
card.text: Destroy all Plains.

card.name: Fleet-Footed Monk
card.text: Fleet-Footed Monk can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.

card.name: Flux
card.text: Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards. Draw a card.

card.name: Forked Lightning
card.text: Forked Lightning deals 4 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

card.name: Fruition
card.text: You gain 1 life for each Forest on the battlefield.

card.name: Gift of Estates
card.text: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Gravedigger
card.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Hand of Death
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Hand of Death
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Harsh Justice
card.text: Cast Harsh Justice only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. This turn, whenever an attacking creature deals combat damage to you, it deals that much damage to its controller.

card.name: Howling Fury
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Hulking Cyclops
card.text: Hulking Cyclops can't block.

card.name: Hulking Goblin
card.text: Hulking Goblin can't block.

card.name: Hurricane
card.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

card.name: Ingenious Thief
card.text: Flying When Ingenious Thief enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand.

card.name: Jungle Lion
card.text: Jungle Lion can't block.

card.name: King's Assassin
card.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Last Chance
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

card.name: Lava Axe
card.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.

card.name: Lava Flow
card.text: Destroy target creature or land.

card.name: Man-o'-War
card.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mercenary Knight
card.text: When Mercenary Knight enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

card.name: Mind Knives
card.text: Target opponent discards a card at random.

card.name: Mind Rot
card.text: Target player discards two cards.

card.name: Mobilize
card.text: Untap all creatures you control.

card.name: Monstrous Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Monstrous Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Mystic Denial
card.text: Counter target creature or sorcery spell.

card.name: Natural Order
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Natural Order, sacrifice a green creature. Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Natural Spring
card.text: Target player gains 8 life.

card.name: Nature's Cloak
card.text: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn.

card.name: Nature's Lore
card.text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Nature's Ruin
card.text: Destroy all green creatures.

card.name: Needle Storm
card.text: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Noxious Toad
card.text: When Noxious Toad dies, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Omen
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.

card.name: Owl Familiar
card.text: Flying When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Path of Peace
card.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

card.name: Personal Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

card.name: Phantom Warrior
card.text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

card.name: Pillaging Horde
card.text: When Pillaging Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

card.name: Plant Elemental
card.text: When Plant Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.

card.name: Primeval Force
card.text: When Primeval Force enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice three Forests.

card.name: Prosperity
card.text: Each player draws X cards.

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

card.name: Rain of Salt
card.text: Destroy two target lands.

card.name: Rain of Tears
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Raise Dead
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Renewing Dawn
card.text: You gain 2 life for each Mountain target opponent controls.

card.name: Sacred Knight
card.text: Sacred Knight can't be blocked by black and/or red creatures.

card.name: Sacred Nectar
card.text: You gain 4 life.

card.name: Scorching Spear
card.text: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Scorching Winds
card.text: Cast Scorching Winds only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Scorching Winds deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

card.name: Seasoned Marshal
card.text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Serpent Assassin
card.text: When Serpent Assassin enters the battlefield, you may destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Serpent Warrior
card.text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

card.name: Sorcerous Sight
card.text: Look at target opponent's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Soul Shred
card.text: Soul Shred deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Spiritual Guardian
card.text: When Spiritual Guardian enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Spitting Earth
card.text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Stalking Tiger
card.text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Starlight
card.text: You gain 3 life for each black creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Steadfastness
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Stern Marshal
card.text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Summer Bloom
card.text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

card.name: Sylvan Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

card.name: Symbol of Unsummoning
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Taunt
card.text: During target player's next turn, creatures that player controls attack you if able.

card.name: Temporary Truce
card.text: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two a player draws this way, that player gains 2 life.

card.name: Theft of Dreams
card.text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Thing from the Deep
card.text: Whenever Thing from the Deep attacks, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice an Island.

card.name: Thundering Wurm
card.text: When Thundering Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.

card.name: Thundermare
card.text: Haste When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

card.name: Tidal Surge
card.text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.

card.name: Time Ebb
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Touch of Brilliance
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Treetop Defense
card.text: Cast Treetop Defense only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn.

card.name: Undying Beast
card.text: When Undying Beast dies, put it on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Untamed Wilds
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Valorous Charge
card.text: White creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Vampiric Feast
card.text: Vampiric Feast deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Vampiric Touch
card.text: Vampiric Touch deals 2 damage to target opponent and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Vengeance
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Virtue's Ruin
card.text: Destroy all white creatures.

card.name: Volcanic Hammer
card.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Warrior's Charge
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Warrior's Charge
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Wicked Pact
card.text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

card.name: Winds of Change
card.text: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Winter's Grasp
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Withering Gaze
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.

card.name: Wood Elves
card.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
